content.description:
Operatic Organism climbs a slightly overhanging face on solid edges.

Sit start with hands matched on the edge. From there, place a left heel, gain a bump through a small right hand edge to a good edge, follow with the left and bump up to a sloper, let the feet cut, and finish up the remaining jugs for an easy mantle.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing is good, but there are some rocks behind where it climbs.
content.location: It climbs the center of Apparition's northwest face.

content.description:
Frightmare climbs a slightly overhanging, undercut arete on good rock.

Sit start with a left hand edge and a right hand edge on the arete. From there, curl up the feet and squeeze that boulder, bump through a pair of left hand edges, follow with the right hand up the arete, reach the jugs before the lip, and mantle on top.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing is flat and clear, but there is a rock behind the problem.
content.location: It climbs the west-facing side of the boulder's southwest arete.
